632340.name: Phoenix [KPHX] airport for Tower!2011:SE
632340.description:
Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport [KORD] for Tower!2011:SE

Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport is a civil/military public airport 3 miles southeast of downtown Phoenix. IATA:PHX, ICAO:KPHX. It the 11th busiest airport in the USA and 29th worldwide.
It handles more than 1200 aircraft operations a day. It has 3 terminals and 126 aircraft gates.
Air traffic control tower began operations on January 14, 2007.
This is among the tallest control tower in North America.
